movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
movies.name: The Shawshank Redemption

movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.
movies.name: The Godfather

movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
movies.name: The Dark Knight

movies.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.
movies.name: The Godfather Part II

movies.description: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.
movies.name: 12 Angry Men

movies.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
movies.name: Schindler's List

movies.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
movies.image: src/photos/moviePhotos/The Lord of the Rings The Return of the King.jpg
movies.name: The Lord of the Rings The Return of the King

movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
movies.name: Pulp Fiction

movies.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
movies.image: src/photos/moviePhotos/The Lord of the Rings The Fellowship of the Ring.jpg
movies.name: The Lord of the Rings The Fellowship of the Ring

movies.description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.
movies.image: src/photos/moviePhotos/The Good, the Bad and the Ugly.jpg
movies.name: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

series.description: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state, leading him to seek professional psychiatric counseling.
series.name: The Sopranos
creator: David Chase
series.seasons: Seasons 1-6 ran from 1999 to 2007. The Sopranos did not air a season during 2005 and season 6 ran a part A and part B that ran in 2006 and 2007.

series.description: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.
series.name: The Simpsons
creator: James L. Brooks
Matt Groening
Sam Simon
series.seasons: 34 Seasons have aired since 1989 and the show is still airing to this day.

series.description: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student in order to secure his family's future.
series.name: Breaking Bad
creator: Vince Gilligan

series.description: The Baltimore drug scene, as seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.
series.name: The Wire
creator: David Simon
series.seasons: Seasons 1-5 ran from 2002 to 2008 and did not air in 2005 and 2007.

series.description: A comedy series adapted from the award-winning play about a young woman trying to cope with life in London whilst coming to terms with a recent tragedy.
series.name: Fleabag
creator: Phoebe Waller-Bridge
series.seasons: Seasons 1-2 Aired in 2016 and 2019. After the second Season Phoebe, the creator, decided that it was time to end the series in order to avoid the slow death of shows like 'The Simpsons' and 'Friends'.

series.description: The continuing misadventures of neurotic New York City stand-up comedian Jerry Seinfeld and his equally neurotic New York City friends.
series.name: Seinfeld
creator: Larry David
Jerry Seinfeld

series.description: A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper.
series.name: Mad Men
creator: Matthew Weiner

series.description: The regulars of the Boston bar 'Cheers' share their experiences and lives with each other while drinking or working at the bar where everybody knows your name.
series.name: Cheers
creator: James Burrows
Glen Charles
Les Charles

series.description: Earn and his cousin Alfred, based in Atlanta, try to make their way in the world through the rap scene. Along the way they come face-to-face with social and economic issues touching on race, relationships, poverty, status, and parenthood.
series.name: Atlanta
creator: Donald Glover
series.seasons: Seasons 1-4 ran from 2016 to 2022 with plans for more. Season 1 aired in 2016, season 2 aired in 2018 and seasons 3 and 4 both aired in 2022.

series.description: The lives and trials of a young single woman and her friends, both at work and at home.
series.name: The Mary Tyler Moore Show
creator: James L. Brooks
Alan Burns
